name: Smoke and Light
description:
Arena-dodging game made in 3 hours for #Trijam 114.

You are a smoke emitter. Dodge the incoming light particles. Use your automatic smoke emission to destroy incoming particles and create an escape route.

Control with WASD, Arrow Keys or Controller (recommended) - reset game with 'Spacebar' or 'Jump'.

Had some fun playing with the particle system in Unity. The game is the result. I hope you enjoy it!

My Highscore: 7830 - Good luck beating it :)

Assets Used:

Unity Standard Assets - CrossPlattformInput

Humble Bundle  - Electronic Abstract Music Pack - Song #6
